message.content:
Based on the information you provided, here is a customized fitness plan for you:

<start>

Day 1 - Session #1
Warm-up: 5-10 minutes of jogging in place
Exercises and intervals: Swimming (4 x 50m lap intervals with 30 second rest in between)
Cooldown: 5-10 minutes of easy swimming
Estimated workout time: 45 minutes

Day 2 - Session #2
Warm-up: 5-10 minutes of static stretching
Exercises and intervals: Military Training (3 x 10 push-ups, 3 x 10 sit-ups, 3 x 10 squats with 30 second rest in between sets)
Cooldown: 5-10 minutes of walking
Estimated workout time: 30-45 minutes

Day 3 - Rest Day

Day 4 - Session #3
Warm-up: 5-10 minutes of jumping jacks
Exercises and intervals: Swimming (4 x 25m lap intervals with 15 second rest in between) and Military Training (2 x 5 push-ups, 2 x 5 sit-ups, 2 x 5 squats with 30 second rest in between sets)
Cooldown: 5-10 minutes of easy swimming
Estimated workout time: 45-60 minutes

Day 5 - Session #4
Warm-up: 5-10 minutes of walking
Exercises and intervals: Military Training (3 x 10 push-ups, 3 x 10 sit-ups, 3 x 10 squats with 30 second rest in between sets)
Cooldown: 5-10 minutes of stretching
Estimated workout time: 30-45 minutes

Day 6 - Rest Day

Day 7 - Session #5
Warm-up: 5-10 minutes of dynamic stretching
Exercises and intervals: Swimming (4 x 25m lap intervals with 15 second rest in between) and Military Training (2 x 5 push-ups, 2 x 5 sit-ups, 2 x 5 squats with 30 second rest in between sets)
Cooldown: 5-10 minutes of easy swimming
Estimated workout time: 45-60 minutes

<stop>

Make sure to drink water before, during, and after workouts to stay hydrated. Also, listen to your body and take breaks if you experience any pain. Keep track of your progress and adjust your plan as needed to meet your goals. Good luck!
